name: Augmented Environments Lab
body:
# [Augmented Environments Lab](http://ael.gatech.edu/lab)
## [GVU Center](http://gvu.gatech.edu), [Georgia Institute of Technology](http://www.gatech.edu)

Here we share code we've written in the lab, much of it related to the [Argon AR browser](http://ael.gatech.edu/argon).  Currently, the [documentation for Argon2 Isotope](http://argonsdk.github.io) is available.

Lab Members (on Github)
* @blairmacintyre
* @jdbolter
* @mariaengberg
* @speigg
* @bryjeep
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
